sense.gloss: to begin to say, to start talking, to broach (a matter), to bring up, to come out with
to be the first to say, to suggest (doing), to propose

sdata.j: そんな↑事↑↓こと↓↑言↑↓|い↓い↑出↑↓だ↓す|とは↑思↑↓おも↓わなかったよ。
sdata.e: I didn't expect that to come from you.

sdata.j: うちの↑弟↑↓おとうと↓は、よく↑寝↑↓ね↓ぼけて↑変↑↓へん↓なことを↑言↑↓|い↓い↑出↑↓だ↓す|。
sdata.e: My little brother gets delirious when he's sleepy. He says the weirdest things.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓を↑言↑↓|い↓い↑出↑↓だ↓す|かな？
↑何↑↓なに↓を↑言↑↓|い↓い↑出↑↓だ↓す|かな？
